name: Commonwealth ex rel. Bolish, Appellant, v. Rundle
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Bolish v. Rundle

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Bolish, Appellant, v. Rundle.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Me. Justice Jones,
Order affirmed. Commonwealth v. Bolish, 391 Pa. 550, 138 A. 2d 447, Commonwealth ex rel. Bolish v. Banmiller, 396 Pa. 129, 151 A. 2d 480, and Commonwealth ex rel. Almeida v. Rundle, 409 Pa. 460, 187 A. 2d 266, control the issues raised on this appeal.
opinions.author: Me. Justice Jones,

attorneys: Daniel Bolish, appellant, in propria persona.
Ralph, P. Needle, Assistant District Attorney,- and Joseph, J. Gimino, District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Bolish, Appellant, v. Rundle.
Submitted January 9, 1964.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Daniel Bolish, appellant, in propria persona.
March 17, 1964:
Ralph, P. Needle, Assistant District Attorney,- and Joseph, J. Gimino, District Attorney, for appellee.
